summary:
Impact
  

Hey, it's IndieWeb Carnival time and this is my first participation.  Following on the tragedy in the United States this week, there's no better time to talk about "Impact"—your impact, however small or insignificant you think it is, other people's impact, the impacts of the powerful (and how your impact can couple with that)—I might get a little spicy.  Or, it could just be the jalapeño potato chips I'm devouring to quell my despair right now...
title: Impact
